value.name: Teacher suspected of possessing child porn arrested at California elementary school, police say
value.description: Let's show you a picture of the teacher, right now. He is 39-year-old Joseph Paige. He works, according to the Anaheim Police Department, here at Gwinn Elementary in Anaheim. Police aren't saying a whole lot about what child pornography images they found ...

value.name: 'I think it's a good thing.' | Kentucky Kingdom begins weekend with new chaperone policy for minors
value.description: “I don’t like the new rule, but I’ll try to comply to it,” 13-year-old Joseph Paige, Dessi’s son ... The rule change and police presence are not ideal but chaperones like Tony Hughes ...
